Name: Cube Worlds Survival
About the game: Cube Worlds Survival is an epic shooter RPG game with voxel style and endless gameplay. Fight with various enemies, collect resources, upgrade your stats and weapons, unlock and explore different worlds but what’s the most important - try to survive! FULLY DESTRUCTIBLE WORLD You have an enormous tools of destruction. Kill enemies with precise headshots or destroy them with tress and ground in large explosions. DOZENS OF WEAPONS Pistols, rifles, shotguns, rocket launchers - everything you can even imagine! Every weapon has a unique look and stats. Chose your perfect tool! EVERYTHING IS UPGRADABLE Upgrade all stats from health to weapons damage. A lot of passive perks. Unlock super expensive abilities that can make you truly invincible! DIFFERENT WORLDS Travel across 12 different worlds with various difficulty and reward settings. From peaceful forests to real hell where you’ll be dead in seconds. TOUGH ENEMIES These guys won’t let you relax even for a second. Buy new guns and upgrades regularly to increase your chances fighting against them. ENDLESS GAMEPLAY Feel yourself like a superhero killing enemies by hundreds? Then start a new game with insane difficulty boost. This time you won’t survive!
